tspan.tspan: Reach the end of the score tracker first

text.tspan: * Reveal Land: +1 VP - If most west: +2VP
* Clear all bandits from a tile: +2VP
* If at the start of your turn your hand is

tspan.tspan: full of Danger cards you are out

text.tspan: * If the bandit tracker reaches the end
Build a railway where you are
Move up to n spaces. - Not onto Water (from water is allowed)
Climb: Move up to n spaces.

tspan.tspan: If revealing a tile requires more
movement than expected, you may activate
more jobs. You do not need

text.tspan: to use all activated movement. If Leaving Bandits: take a 'P' Danger.

tspan.tspan: For each group of bandits on the board, not on a player. Starting with
the most East then North. Roll the Compas Dice to move group 1 space.
(If Standard D6: 1,2,3 => West. 4=> North. 5 => South. 6=> Add a bandit )
Bandits can move on any type of land (even unrevealed), but if they
would move off even that, move them West instead.
Roll the bandit dice as indicated by the furthest tracker on the board.
Each roll, place a bandit counter in all tiles matching that number.
* Bandits take damage by removing a bandit.
* Players fight together and take damage as 'P' Danger cards
(All players on tile take 1 'P' card per Damage taken.)
1) All players on a the tile may activate '
3) Defenders take one damage for every hit above saves
5) Attackers take 1 damage for every hit above saves.
(If bandits are removed completeley, All players who contributed score 2 VP)
